sentences.english: Think twice even when there is only one negative reference.
sentences.chinese: 即便只有一个负面的意见，你也要三思而后行。
但他们需要三思而后行。

sentences.english: "Look before you leap"is a warning against people acting rashly.
sentences.chinese: “三思而后行”这条谚语是告诫人们不要鲁莽行事。

sentences.english: The moral of the story is “Look before you leap.”
sentences.chinese: 这故事的寓意是“三思而后行”。

sentences.english: Anyways, you have to think twice before you act.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，你要三思而后行。
